author: Amy Cheng, Meryl Kornfield, Andrew Jeong
title: Russia-Ukraine live updates: Kyiv wakes after night of street fighting, loud gunfire and explosions
description: Some clashes appeared to take place mere miles away from Kyiv's government quarter.
content: Ukrainian lawmaker and tech executive Kira Rudik repeated her intent to bear arms against Russian troops entering Kyiv during a television interview early Saturday local time, stressing that the counâ€¦ [+1243 chars]
